forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 5C. SE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 40F. SE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low around 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 39F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the morning. High 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the morning. High 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Clear skies later. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming clear later. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening changing to mainly rain showers overnight. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers later on. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
